title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: The package view is filtered when a working set with one project is created and selected.
EB: The package view should only refilter when closing the working set selection dialog, not while manipulating the working set. Pressing cancel should revert all changes made to the working sets.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a working set with one project. 2. Select the working set. Ensure the package view is filtered.
